title: NGO-Hub
description: Developed a comprehensive platform for efficient NGO management, featuring user-friendly interfaces, secure authentication, and role-based access for managing volunteers, admins, and other operational aspects.

title: Signexo
description: A Digital Signature Tool, a simple, secure website built using React.js and Firebase to sign your PDFs with authentication

title: EcoDrive
description: A carpooling application that enhances ride-sharing experiences by providing real-time distances with fares and leveraging Maps API to display available drivers along your chosen route.

title: MentorConnect
description: A platform connecting candidates with industry mentors for career guidance, skill development, and employment support through automated scheduling and integrated virtual sessions.
